attributes.action: Regulate businesses who increase their prices in line with major events
attributes.additional_details: This would give everybody from all backgrounds an equal opportunity to attend and enjoy major events, rather than just those who can afford to pay the inflated prices.
attributes.background: When there are major events, such as festivals, concerts or sporting events, hotels and transport companies increase their prices to ludicrous amounts, sometimes by 200%. We are asking the government to regulate the way in which these companies price their services, to make it fair for the consumer.

rejection.details: The Government isn't responsible for how prices for goods and services are changed to respond to demand. This is a matter for individual businesses.
